channel.title: Comments on: The Salt Lick
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: E
item.dc:creator: E
item.description:
I was just there this past Saturday evening :)
Good stuff. I feel a bit traitorous saying that I like Rudy's brisket better...
item.content:encoded:
I was just there this past Saturday evening ðŸ™‚

Good stuff. I feel a bit traitorous saying that I like Rudy’s brisket better…

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Jeff took us there when we visited him a few years ago. It was truly a mighty barbecue experience, though all-you-can-eat generally isn't such a great bargain for me. Hmm, now I know what I'd like for dinner....
item.content:encoded: Jeff took us there when we visited him a few years ago. It was truly a mighty barbecue experience, though all-you-can-eat generally isn’t such a great bargain for me. Hmm, now I know what I’d like for dinner….
